text:
Created attachment 35000
unable to find the webservice.

Please find the error file attached. I have cross checked my web xml and servlet.xml file. they all look good.

versions
eclispe neon 3
spring framework 4.3.8 release
jdk 1.8
tomact 9 MSI

Would appricate if you can get back to me with temporary solution as I have spend long time to find resolution.

TIA

Many Thanks
Vasanthi

Hi,

Please use users@tomcat.apache.org for questions and help!
Report issues in BugZilla only when you know for sure that there is a bug in Tomcat!
Also you may want to use newer version of Tomcat. 9.0.0-M1 is very old!
creator: mgrigorov@apache.org
